title: LB mini rework needs to focus on making her less clunky
body:
Passive cannot be proc'd on the same target for 5 seconds. 

W damage is kind of laughable and only serves to apply her passive to multiple targets or more manageable poke. 

E has a slight delay before firing. 

R has a slight delay before activation of mimic'd ability. 

Whatever mini rework she gets needs to focus on reducing this clunkiness and perhaps reward trickery. 

She still performs decently, I'm not saying she sucks or anything. But, an assassin shouldn't feel this clunky to play.

replies.body:
